greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for a(Squarefree numbers > 1) = constant sequences.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, if A008966(n) = 1 [when n is in A005117], then a(n) = 2, otherwise a(n) = 2+A057627(n).
program: partialsums(f,up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), s=0); for(i=1,up_to,s += f(i); v[i] = s); (v); }
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 02 2018
